item.description:
Drop by whenever you get out of work. We plan to meet at the upstairs bar between 6:00 and 6:30 and stay until 8:00 or so, depending on the group vibe.

This bar has extensive food and drink menus. Some people may plan to eat dinner there, while others may just stop by for a drink on the way home. There are also pool tables upstairs.

Here is a link to the venue: http://www.beerworks....

Please RSVP on the meetup site so we have a sense of how many people are coming. If you have questions, click on "contact me" on the left under my photo on our meetup page.

See you there!

Karin
item.name: The Boston Architecture October Meetup
